mapper.select: SELECT XA.REPT_DAY, XA.REPT_NUM, XA.REPT_GBN, XC.CODE_NM, XA.BRAN_CD, XA.REPT_AMT, XA.OVER_AMT, DECODE( XA.REPT_GBN, '03', ( SELECT REPTPRES FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_TRANS WHERE REPT_DAY = XA.REPT_DAY AND REPT_NUM = XA.REPT_NUM ), '' ) AS REPTPRES, DECODE( XA.REPT_GBN, '03', ( SELECT RECEPT_BANK FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_TRANS WHERE REPT_DAY = XA.REPT_DAY AND REPT_NUM = XA.REPT_NUM ), '' ) AS TRANS_REMAK, XB.BANK_NM, XA.BANK_CD, XA.ACCN_NUM, XA.REMAK, XA.RECV_DAY FROM ( SELECT REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, REPT_GBN, BRAN_CD, REPT_AMT - COMIS REPT_AMT, REPT_AMT - COMIS OVER_AMT, REMAK, BANK_CD, ACCN_NUM, RECV_DAY FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT WHERE BRAN_CD = #{branCd} AND DISTR_GBN IS NULL AND UPSO_CD IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, REPT_GBN, BRAN_CD, REPT_AMT - COMIS REPT_AMT, REPT_AMT - COMIS OVER_AMT, '지부분배 가수금 (미분배)' REMAK, BANK_CD, ACCN_NUM, RECV_DAY FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT WHERE BRAN_CD = #{branCd} AND DISTR_GBN = '41' AND REPT_DAY || REPT_NUM || REPT_GBN NOT IN ( SELECT REPT_DAY || REPT_NUM || REPT_GBN FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_DISTR ) UNION ALL SELECT A.REPT_DAY, A.REPT_NUM, A.REPT_GBN, C.BRAN_CD, C.REPT_AMT - NVL(C.COMIS, 0) REPT_AMT, C.REPT_AMT - NVL(C.COMIS, 0) - NVL(B.REPT_AMT, 0) OVER_AMT, '지부분배 가수금' REMAK, C.BANK_CD, C.ACCN_NUM, C.RECV_DAY FROM ( SELECT REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, REPT_GBN, SUM(NVL(DISTR_AMT, 0)) REPT_AMT FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_DISTR GROUP BY REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, REPT_GBN ) A, ( SELECT REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, REPT_GBN, SUM(NVL(DISTR_AMT, 0)) REPT_AMT FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_UPSO_DISTR GROUP BY REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, REPT_GBN ) B, GIBU.TBRA_REPT C WHERE C.BRAN_CD = #{branCd} AND B.REPT_DAY = A.REPT_DAY AND B.REPT_NUM = A.REPT_NUM AND B.REPT_GBN = A.REPT_GBN AND C.REPT_DAY = A.REPT_DAY AND C.REPT_NUM = A.REPT_NUM AND C.REPT_GBN = A.REPT_GBN AND A.REPT_AMT - NVL(B.REPT_AMT, 0) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT A.REPT_DAY, A.REPT_NUM, A.REPT_GBN, A.BRAN_CD, (A.REPT_AMT - A.COMIS) REPT_AMT, (A.REPT_AMT - A.COMIS) - NVL(B.REPT_AMT, 0) OVER_AMT, '업소분배 가수금' REMAK, A.BANK_CD, A.ACCN_NUM, A.RECV_DAY FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT A, ( SELECT REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, SUM(NVL(DISTR_AMT, 0)) REPT_AMT FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_UPSO_DISTR WHERE BRAN_CD = #{branCd} GROUP BY REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM ) B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = #{branCd} AND A.REPT_DAY = B.REPT_DAY(+) AND A.REPT_NUM = B.REPT_NUM(+) AND A.DISTR_GBN = '42' AND (A.REPT_AMT - A.COMIS) - NVL(B.REPT_AMT, 0) > 0 ) XA, ACCT.TCAC_BANK XB, FIDU.TENV_CODE XC WHERE XB.BANK_CD = XA.BANK_CD AND XC.HIGH_CD = '00141' AND XC.CODE_CD = XA.REPT_GBN AND XA.ACCN_NUM = DECODE(#{accnNum}, NULL, XA.ACCN_NUM, #{accnNum}) AND XA.REPT_AMT <> 0 ORDER BY XA.REPT_DAY, XA.REPT_NUM

SELECT XA.REPT_DAY, XA.REPT_NUM, XA.REPT_GBN, XE.CODE_NM, XA.MAPPING_DAY, XA.BRAN_CD, XA.UPSO_CD, XB.UPSO_NM, MIN(NOTE_YRMN) START_YRMN, MAX(NOTE_YRMN) END_YRMN, XA.REPT_AMT, DECODE( XA.REPT_GBN, '03', ( SELECT REPTPRES FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_TRANS WHERE REPT_DAY = XA.REPT_DAY AND REPT_NUM = XA.REPT_NUM ), '' ) AS REPTPRES, XD.BANK_NM, XA.BANK_CD, XA.ACCN_NUM, XA.REMAK, XA.RECV_DAY FROM ( SELECT REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, REPT_GBN, MAPPING_DAY, BRAN_CD, UPSO_CD, REPT_AMT - COMIS REPT_AMT, REMAK, BANK_CD, ACCN_NUM, RECV_DAY FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT WHERE BRAN_CD = #{branCd} AND SUBSTR(REPT_DAY, 1, 6) < SUBSTR(MAPPING_DAY, 1, 6) AND MAPPING_DAY BETWEEN #{reptYrmn} || '01' AND #{reptYrmn} || '31' AND DISTR_GBN IS NULL AND REPT_GBN = '03' UNION ALL SELECT A.REPT_DAY, A.REPT_NUM, A.REPT_GBN, A.MAPPING_DAY, A.BRAN_CD, A.UPSO_CD, A.REPT_AMT, A.REMAK, B.BANK_CD, B.ACCN_NUM, B.RECV_DAY FROM ( SELECT REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, REPT_GBN, BRAN_CD, UPSO_CD, DISTR_AMT REPT_AMT, MAPPING_DAY, REMAK FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_UPSO_DISTR WHERE BRAN_CD = #{branCd} AND MAPPING_DAY BETWEEN #{reptYrmn} || '01' AND #{reptYrmn} || '31' ) A, GIBU.TBRA_REPT B WHERE A.BRAN_CD = #{branCd} AND SUBSTR(A.REPT_DAY, 1, 6) < SUBSTR(A.MAPPING_DAY, 1, 6) AND B.REPT_DAY = A.REPT_DAY AND B.REPT_NUM = A.REPT_NUM AND B.REPT_GBN = A.REPT_GBN AND B.REPT_GBN = '03' ) XA, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO XB, GIBU.TBRA_NOTE XC, ACCT.TCAC_BANK XD, FIDU.TENV_CODE XE WHERE XB.UPSO_CD = XA.UPSO_CD AND XC.UPSO_CD(+) = XA.UPSO_CD AND XC.REPT_DAY(+) = XA.REPT_DAY AND XC.REPT_NUM(+) = XA.REPT_NUM AND XC.REPT_GBN(+) = XA.REPT_GBN AND XD.BANK_CD = XA.BANK_CD AND XE.HIGH_CD = '00141' AND XE.CODE_CD = XA.REPT_GBN GROUP BY XA.REPT_DAY, XA.REPT_NUM, XA.REPT_GBN, XE.CODE_NM, XA.MAPPING_DAY, XA.BRAN_CD, XA.UPSO_CD, XB.UPSO_NM, XA.REPT_AMT, XD.BANK_NM, XA.BANK_CD, XA.ACCN_NUM, XA.REMAK, XA.RECV_DAY ORDER BY REPT_DAY DESC, REPT_NUM DESC
